languages.text: "Люди прогнали с Даргонуса твоих выродков пинками под зад, так что издевка неуместна".
languages.translation_comment:
Recaptured Eufrates II.
Marazhai: "Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."

languages.text: "It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."
languages.translation_comment:
Recaptured Eufrates II.
Marazhai: "Observing your kind carry out assaults on worlds proves once again that humans have not advanced much beyond clubs and stones."
languages.original_text: "Люди прогнали с Даргонуса твоих выродков пинками под зад, так что издевка неуместна".

traits.locale_text: "It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is unfounded."
"It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is unfounded."
"It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."
"It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."
"It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."
"It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスで汚らわしいお前たちの仲間を打ち負かしたのは人間だ。だからお前の嘲りは無意味だ」
languages.original_text: "It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスで汚らわしいお前たちの仲間を打ち負かしたのは人間だ。だからお前の嘲りは無意味だ」

languages.text: "Es waren Menschen, die Euren üblen Schlag auf Dargonus geleitet haben, Euer Spott greift ins Leere."
languages.original_text: "It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."

traits.locale_text: "Es waren Menschen, die Euren üblen Schlag auf Dargonus geleitet haben, Euer Spott greift ins Leere."

languages.text: «Fueron los humanos los que expulsaron a tu inmunda especie de Dargonus, así que tus burlas son inútiles».
languages.original_text: "It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."

traits.locale_text: «Fueron los humanos los que expulsaron a tu inmunda especie de Dargonus, así que tus burlas son inútiles».

languages.text: “你的讥讽毫无意义，别忘了，当初就是人类在达戈努斯打败了你们这些渣滓。”
languages.original_text: "It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."

traits.locale_text: “你的讥讽毫无意义，别忘了，当初就是人类在达戈努斯打败了你们这些渣滓。”

languages.text: "Sizin iğrenç türünüzü Dargonus'ta bozguna uğratanlar insanlardı. O yüzden bu alay etme çabaların nafile."
languages.original_text: "It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."

traits.locale_text: "Sizin iğrenç türünüzü Dargonus'ta bozguna uğratanlar insanlardı. O yüzden bu alay etme çabaların nafile."

languages.original_text: "It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."

languages.text: « Ce sont les humains qui ont chassé votre misérable engeance de Dargonus, alors gardez vos sarcasmes pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "It was humans who routed your foul kind on Dargonus, so your mockery is pointless."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont les humains qui ont chassé votre misérable engeance de Dargonus, alors gardez vos sarcasmes pour vous. »
